entity.name: Scandal
entity.description: Olivia Pope, a former media relations consultant to the president, is ready to move on with her life and opens her own crisis-management firm, but she can't seem to shake ties with her past. Pope's staff includes womaniser-turned-family man Stephen Finch, slick litigator Harrison Wright and hacker extraordinaire Huck. As she moves forward it becomes clear that while her staffers may specialise in cleaning up the lives of other people, they can't seem to do the same for themselves.

@m_h_shelton @HeritageFundUK @WessexRivers @EnvAgency I used to get mine from Filcris https://t.co/QtEM6UDxxi - they now only sell rafts where the polystyrene floats are encased with recycled plastic edging if it helps! I know @EssexWT_Darren was investigating alternatives to polystyrene use in rafts ages ago, any thoughts Darren?
@hackneymartian @RomanGeezer @SaveLeaMarshes @HMUG_Hackney @StonebridgeLock @EnvAgencySE @LDNWaterkeeper @theriverstrust @DrCSyn I suppose so. Would be interesting to know what @thameswater did...

@tfortysix @RomanGeezer @SaveLeaMarshes @HMUG_Hackney @StonebridgeLock @EnvAgencySE @LDNWaterkeeper @theriverstrust @DrCSyn There was no danger of washing it downstream, btw. The bed was dry and the trash screen has a sill.
@tfortysix @RomanGeezer @SaveLeaMarshes @HMUG_Hackney @StonebridgeLock @EnvAgencySE @LDNWaterkeeper @theriverstrust @DrCSyn Of course. It's possible to have 2 containers on a tanker, I would think.
